newsitem.title: LEBANON: Bank of Lebanon weekly CDs raise four bln pounds.
newsitem.headline: Bank of Lebanon weekly CDs raise four bln pounds.

text.p: The Bank of Lebanon issued on Thursday certificates of deposit dated November 1 to commercial banks worth four billion Lebanese pounds compared with 10 billion last week.
The Bank sold 45-day CDs worth three billion pounds compared with two billion last week. It sold 60-day CDs worth one billion pounds compared with eight billion last week.
Interest rates on the 45- and 60-day CDs were 12.50 percent and 13.25 percent respectively, down from 12.75 percent and 13.50 last week.
